org.jivesoftware.smackx.muc

Interface InvitationRejectionListener


  • public interface InvitationRejectionListener
    A listener that is fired anytime an invitee declines or rejects an invitation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void invitationDeclined(org.jxmpp.jid.EntityBareJid invitee, String reason, Message message, MUCUser.Decline rejection)
      Called when the invitee declines the invitation.

    • Method Detail

      • invitationDeclined

        void invitationDeclined(org.jxmpp.jid.EntityBareJid invitee,
                        String reason,
                        Message message,
                        MUCUser.Decline rejection)
        Called when the invitee declines the invitation.
        Parameters:
        invitee - the invitee that declined the invitation. (e.g. hecate@shakespeare.lit).
        reason - the reason why the invitee declined the invitation.
        message - the message used to decline the invitation.
        rejection - the raw decline found in the message.
